definition: plain cooked rice/rice with nothing to go with it

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to eat plain rice/(fig.) to eat and not pay for it/to sponge off others/to freeload

sentences.english: Our company will never afford (free lunch for )the unearned people.
sentences.chinese: 喫白飯，意爲不勞而獲，喫免費的午餐。

sentences.english: He likes to have rice and pickles for meals.
To eat plain rice or pasta without other dishes.
sentences.chinese: 他沒有要炒菜，只吃白飯。

sentences.english: Would you like to have rice?
I'd like to have steamed rice for dinner.
Udaya filled the Blessed One's bowl with rice.
sentences.chinese: 三時，優陀耶婆羅門，以白飯盛滿世尊之鉢。

sentences.english: All items are served with steamed rice and daily Chinese soup.
sentences.chinese: 所有亞洲精選包括香軟白飯及是日中式餐湯。

sentences.english: To choose Penne or Rice in Substitutions for Spaghetti.
sentences.chinese: 不喫義大利麪者另有尖管麪或白飯可選擇。

sentences.english: Put the rice in the bowl, pour the hot Oolong tea, mix together and serve.
sentences.chinese: 將白飯盛人碗內，衝入烏龍茶，伴勻即可食用。

sentences.english: The bowl of rice is accompanied by a variety of dishes prepared by designers all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 圍繞著這碗白飯的，正是設計師們精心炮製的小菜。

sentences.english: Moon Bridge Special Over Rice with beef, peas, egg white and cornstarch over rice.
sentences.chinese: 月亮橋什燴飯以牛肉及青豆燴蛋白淋於白飯之上。

sentences.english: It's cooked with lemon and savored with rice.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬汁煎鮭魚，有附白飯。

sentences.english: The Brahmin Udaya filled the Blessed One's bowl with rice.
sentences.chinese: 三時，優陀耶婆羅門，以白飯盛滿世尊之鉢。

sentences.english: Could I have one more bowl of plain rice?

sentences.chinese: 白飯喫不成，只好苦一生。

sentences.english: Fried Chicken, Scrabble Egg with Tomato, Broccoli, SteamRice.
sentences.chinese: 雞排，番茄炒蛋，白飯，芥藍。
